timeline.bodyText: I wonder if this method (which is generic enough to be useful in other places) would be better suited to live in the JcrQueryHelper class.
timeline.author: carlosmunoz

replies.bodyText: Yes. Since GetObjectByUUID also makes use of this, I was going to raise a JIRA so that GetObjectByUUID can also be refactored.
replies.author: aprajshekhar

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if this dependency should be provided and added instead to the provisioning files in the pantheon-slingstart maven module. I think it's already an OSGI bundle.
timeline.author: carlosmunoz

replies.bodyText:
According to sling documentation[1], query is added with normal scope. Please correct me if I misread the document.
Also, it seems the OSGi bundle for or a bundle that exports org.apache.sling.query is not available (checked via web console). I have added a note for myself to keep an eye on this library.
If an OSGi bundle is available, I will add it as you suggested :).
[1] - https://sling.apache.org/documentation/bundles/sling-query.html
replies.author: aprajshekhar

replies.bodyText: ahh... yes, if it's not an OSGI bundle then this is the right approach. Thanks for looking into it!
replies.author: carlosmunoz
